summary: A new type of arrow with some special star effect.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59760-3-1415419389.jpg[/img]
Name: Starshoot Arrow
Author: StarDust (from ANK team, CHN)
[size=3]Translator and uploader: homosaikou
[/size]
[color=#ff0000][color=#ff0000]Introduction:[/color]
[/color][font=Times New Roman][b]This mod uses some textures from [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27621/?][b]Power of The Stars[/b][/url][b] by bl3azy, [color=#6d9eeb] [color=#6fa8dc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17582/?]Equipment of Eternal Shine[/url][/color] [/color]by lKocMoHaBTl.
This mod adds a new type of arrow, Starshoot Arrow. It has the advantage of long range and a glaring look.
During its flight, it gives out ministars with a tail at the bottom.
When it attack the enemy, the starbloom occurs.

[color=#ff0000]How to get it:[/color]
help "starshoot arrow" or craftable

[/b][color=#ff0000][b]Video
[/b][youtube]l0hXKBeNzp4[/youtube]
[/color][b][color=#ffffff]By Vatiwah
starshoot arrow part begins at 06:55
[/color][/b]
[youtube]7HWa1v4eCaU[/youtube]
[size=5][font=Times New Roman][b][color=#ffffff]By Seriezs
starshoot arrow part begins at 04:01[/color][/b][/font][/size]

[color=#ff0000][b]Recommended mods:
[/b][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27621/?][b][font=Times New Roman][size=5]Power of The Stars[/size][/font][/b][/url] : It contains many star things and another type of arrow, Star Arrows. Compatible with my mod.[b][size=5][font=Times New Roman][color=#000080] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17582/?][font=Times New Roman][color=#6fa8dc][size=5][b]Equipment of Eternal Shine[/b][/size][/color][/font][/url][/color][/font][/size][/b][color=#6fa8dc] [/color]: Good quiver and arrows, I use it in Starshoot Arrow.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25022/][b]Shooting Stars[/b][/url] : Great work by isoku.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59119/]Nightsky via Silver[/url] : The nightsky texture replacer translated by me.

[/font][color=#ff0000]Credits:
[/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27621/?][b][font=Times New Roman][size=5]Power of The Stars[/size][/font][/b][/url]  bl3azy
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17582/?][font=Times New Roman][color=#6fa8dc][size=5][b]Equipment of Eternal Shine[/b][/size][/color][/font][/url][size=5][font=Times New Roman][b]by [/b][b]lKocMoHaBTl ( I sent him message several days ago, and now waiting for his reply) [/b][size=2]co'mon his last online on Steam is 54 days ago, don't tell me he's afk from skyrim.[/size][/font][/size][/size]
author: StarDust
